name: Grant of God
description:
This is a synchronous turn-based card battle game, you will form your own card deck through the combination of characters, weapons and equipment, to meet any challenges, currently support 1V1 battle.

Game characteristic gameplay


1, synchronous out of the card
Play card in the same time with your opponent, avoid turn-based waiting and first hand problems

2. Interactive battles
Use the transposition mechanism to avoid the opponent's possible attack, and use the normal attack card to directly cut down the opponent's powerful skills

3. The second-level group card mechanism reduces the learning cost
It consists of 8 hero and weapon cards to form the whole card group, and introduces the one-key card group function,it will greatly reduce the learning cost
